refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns statistics for a running server as a result set

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Depending of input parameter displays a statistics for running server.
Note that counters reported by status will be reset after server startup.

refsect2.title: option
refsect2.para: This option controls the level of detail of the output returned from this procedure. Possible options are:

simplelist.member: not supplied - general statistics report including : Database, Lock, Client, Replication status will be returned.
'c' - the report will contain also additional status report on running statements
'r' - to include transactional replication status report
'h' - to include hash indexes usage report

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: Status returns a result set with one varchar column, one row per line of text in the status report.
